data.text: Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze,
Nɨ gan, ghuariar pɨziba nguazir kamɨn danganiba bar da avara.
Eghtɨ Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba nɨn angazangarir kamɨn ganigh, nɨ bagh izam.
“Nɨ kogh pɨn tintinibar gantɨ, nɨn gumazamiziba uari akuvagh nɨ bagh izam.
Eghtɨ nɨ bizir kamɨn ganigh, nɨn guam angazangarimɨn mɨn taghtaghtɨ,
Midianɨn kantri ko Efan kantri, aningɨn gumazamiziba, uan kamelɨn avɨriba inightɨ,
“Eghtɨ Kedaria ko Nebaiotia uan sipsipba nɨ bagh da inigh izam.
“Munar bizir ghurghurir tiziba ghuarimɨn mɨn garima, amɨnim ada inigha ongarim gisɨn izi,
Kar, Tarsisɨn nguibar bar saghon itimɨn kuriba.
“O Jerusalem, Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba izɨ ua nɨn dɨvazir gavgavibar ingaram.
Kamaghɨn nɨn dɨvazir gavgavibar tiar akaba, arueba ko dɨmagaribar kuighiregh ikɨtɨ,
Ezɨ kantrin nɨn apengan ikia nɨn ingangaribar amuan aghuaziba,
“Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba, Lebanonɨn kantrin ruarir ekiamɨn ghuavanegh,
Egha fomɨra paza nɨ gamua bar nɨ gifongezir puvatɨzir darasi,
“O Jerusalem, nɨ bar ikuvigha pura itima, gumazitam nɨn tuavibar mangɨ izegh gamir puvatɨ.
Nɨ kantrin igharazibar bizir bar aghuibara initɨ,
“Kɨ nɨn brasba inigh, da ikarvagh golba isɨ nɨ danɨngam.
Egh nguazir kamɨn ruaghatevir nɨ gariba,
“Aruem ua nɨ bagh angazangarimɨn mɨn ikian kogham,
Kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God, kɨ zurara nɨn angazangarimɨn mɨn ikɨtɨ,
Nɨn gumazamiziba bar moghɨra arazir aghuibara damu,
O Jerusalem, gumazir nɨn ikia ziam puvatɨzim, a gumazamizir ikɨzir dafamɨn afeziamɨn otogham.
